model.name: Everyday LV Crewneck
model.disambiguatingDescription: This piece reengineers a T-shirt shape as a knitted top, adorned with the collection’s Everyday LV signature. The signature - incorporating a Monogram Flower in the exclamation mark - is reproduced in intarsia on a lightweight cotton knit. A silk inside-out effect label on the back adds the finishing touch.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Green
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 34’’ / 86.5 cm, height 6'1.5’’ / 186 cm
  • Made in Italy
